1.name: King Kong
1.description: A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal ape who takes a shine to their female blonde star. He is then captured and brought back to New York City for public exhibition.

2.name: Baby Face
2.description: A young woman, sexually exploited all her life, decides to turn the tables and exploit the hapless men at a big city bank - by gleefully sleeping her way to the top.

3.name: The Invisible Man
3.description: A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

4.name: Ekstase
4.description: Eva has just gotten married to an older gentleman, but discovers that he is obsessed with order in his life and doesn't have much room for passion. She becomes despondent and leaves him, ...                See full summary »

5.name: Duck Soup
5.description: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

6.name: Sons of the Desert
6.description: When Stan and Ollie trick their wives into thinking that they are taking a medicinal cruise while they're actually going to a convention, the wives find out the truth the hard way.

7.name: 42nd Street
7.description: A director puts on what may be his last Broadway show and, at the last moment, a naive newcomer has to replace the star.

8.name: Somewhere in Sonora
8.description: John Bishop discovers a plot to rob a silver mine belonging to his girlfriend Mary's father and, to foil the evildoers, he joins them.

9.name: Little Women
9.description: A chronicle of the lives of a group of sisters growing up in nineteenth-century America.

10.name: Cavalcade
10.description: The triumphs and tragedies of two English families, the upper-crust Marryots and the working-class Bridges, from 1899 to 1933 are portrayed.

11.name: Gold Diggers of 1933
11.description: A wealthy composer rescues unemployed Broadway performers with a new play.

12.name: Alice in Wonderland
12.description: In Victorian England a bored young girl dreams that she has entered a fantasy world called Wonderland populated by even more fantastic characters.

13.name: The Vampire Bat
13.description: When corpses drained of blood begin to show up in a European village, vampirism is suspected to be responsible.

14.name: Das Testament des Dr. Mabuse
14.description: A new crime wave grips the city and all clues seem to lead to the nefarious Dr. Mabuse, even though he has been imprisoned in a mental asylum for nearly a decade.

15.name: Footlight Parade
15.description: Chester Kent struggles against time, romance, and a rival's spy to produce spectacular live "prologues" for movie houses.

16.name: The Barbarian
16.description: An American tourist catches the eye of a disguised Arab prince who decides to kidnap her, then try to win her love.

17.name: Design for Living
17.description: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, and the trio agree to try living together in a platonic friendly relationship.

18.name: Dinner at Eight
18.description: Affluent Millicent and Oliver Jordan throw a dinner for a handful of wealthy and/or well-born acquaintances, each of whom has much to reveal.

19.name: She Done Him Wrong
19.description: In the Gay Nineties, a seductive nightclub singer contends with several suitors, including a jealous escaped convict and a handsome temperance league member.

20.name: The Private Life of Henry VIII.
20.description: King Henry VIII marries five more times after his divorce from his first wife Catherine of Aragon.

21.name: Roman Scandals
21.description: A kind-hearted young man is thrown out of his corrupt home town of West Rome, Oklahoma. He falls asleep and dreams that he is back in the days of olden Rome, where he gets mixed up with court intrigue and a murder plot against the Emperor.

22.name: Morning Glory
22.description: When a naively innocent, aspiring actress arrives on the Broadway scene, she is taken under the wing of several theater veterans who mentor her to ultimate success.

23.name: The Son of Kong
23.description: The men who captured the giant ape King Kong return to Skull Island and find his likewise gigantic but far more friendly son.

24.name: Sagebrush Trail
24.description: Imprisoned for a murder he did not commit, John Brant escapes and ends up out west where, after giving the local lawmen the slip, he joins up with an outlaw gang. Brant finds out that '...                See full summary »

25.name: Flying Down to Rio
25.description: An aviator and band leader who is always getting his group fired for his flirtatious behavior with the female guests soon finds himself falling for an engaged woman.

26.name: State Fair
26.description: An Iowa family finds adventure, love, and heartbreak, when they spend a week at the state fair.

27.name: Dancing Lady
27.description: An attractive dancer is rescued from jail by a rich man, who helps her to have her first big opportunity at a musical play on Broadway.

28.name: Lady for a Day
28.description: A gangster tries to make Apple Annie, the Times Square apple seller, a lady for a day.

29.name: The Story of Temple Drake
29.description: A wealthy but neurotic Southern belle finds herself trapped in the hideout of a gang of vicious bootleggers. The gang's leader lusts after her, and is determined not to let anything stand in the way of his having her.

30.name: The Kennel Murder Case
30.description: Philo Vance, accompanied by his prize-losing Scottish terrier, investigates the locked-room murder of a prominent and much-hated collector whose broken Chinese vase provides an important clue.

31.name: Christopher Strong
31.description: A famous female flier and a member of Parliament drift into a potentially disastrous affair.

32.name: The Devil's Brother
32.description: Two wannabe bandits join the service of a dashing nobleman, who secretly masquerades as Fra Diavolo, a notorious outlaw.

33.name: Mystery of the Wax Museum
33.description: The disappearance of people and corpses leads a reporter to a wax museum and a sinister sculptor.

34.name: Eskimo
34.description: The happy life of an Eskimo is disastrously changed when he mingles with an unscrupulous white trader.

35.name: Riders of Destiny
35.description: Bad guy Kincaid controls the local water supply and plans to do in the other ranchers. Government agent Saunders shows up undercover to do in Kincaid and win the heart of one of his victims Fay Denton.

36.name: Queen Christina
36.description: Queen Christina of Sweden is a popular monarch who is loyal to her country. However, when she falls in love with a Spanish envoy, she must choose between the throne and the man she loves.

37.name: The Eagle and the Hawk
37.description: The pilots of a Royal Air Force squadron in World War I face not only physical but mental dangers in their struggle to survive while fighting the enemy.

38.name: Chance at Heaven
38.description: An ambitious mechanic is tempted to desert his wonderful girlfriend when a silly but rich debutante falls for him.

39.name: The Song of Songs
39.description: Lily falls in love with the sculptor who leaves her out of fear of commitment.

40.name: The Ghoul
40.description: An Egyptologist returns from the dead to take revenge on those who have violated his tomb.

41.name: Viktor und Viktoria
41.description: Aspiring singer Susanne takes over for ham actor Viktor at a small cabaret in Berlin where he works a woman impersonator and per chance she's discovered by an agent, who thinks that she ...                See full summary »

42.name: Today We Live
42.description: During WWI, two officers, one a pilot and the other in the navy, compete for the same beautiful young woman.

43.name: A Study in Scarlet
43.description: In London, a secret society led by lawyer Thaddeus Merrydew collects the assets of any of its deceased members and divides them among the remaining members. Society members start dropping ...                See full summary »

44.name: Professional Sweetheart
44.description: A vice-free radio singer wants to experience the dark side of life, so a press agent convinces her sponsor to choose a "professional sweetheart" from her fans.

45.name: His Private Secretary
45.description: Dick Wallace secretly marries a minister's grand-daughter but his father, who thinks she is a gold digger, is opposed. She takes a job with the company under her maiden name to prove she's okay.

46.name: I'm No Angel
46.description: Circus performer Tira seeks a better life pursuing the company of wealthy New York men with improbable comic complications along the way.

47.name: Deluge
47.description: A massive earthquake strikes the United States, which destroys the West Coast and unleashes a massive flood that threatens to destroy the East Coast as well.

48.name: Tarzan the Fearless
48.description: In the African Jungle, a group of Europeans come across the fabled white man who was raised by apes. Tarzan takes an immediate liking to the blond Mary Brooks and rescues her during a nasty...                See full summary »

49.name: Midnight Mary
49.description: An abused orphan sinks into a life of crime.

50.name: The Three Musketeers
50.description: Tom Wayne rescues Clancy, Renard and Schmidt in the Arabian desert and they join him in going after El Shaitan, a bad guy who is never seen as he tries to wipe out the Foreign Legion.
